{ "bizCode": 10000, "data": { "allScores": null, "awayTeam": "Fluminense", "awayTeamIcon": "https://static.msport.com/public/up/afe3af77-51e3-48f1-acde-2483ad82e49d.png", "awayTeamId": "sr:competitor:1961", "bookingStatus": "Booked", "category": "International Clubs", "categoryIcon": "https://static.msport.com/public/up/9cac06bc-0223-41c9-9e0f-a768b416a92f.png", "categoryId": "sr:category:393", "eventId": "sr:match:57490689", "hasLive": 0, "hasLiveCoverage": 1, "hasLiveWidget": 1, "hasVoucher": 1, "homeTeam": "Inter Milano", "homeTeamIcon": "https://static.msport.com/public/up/a529fb3b-867e-4395-9833-2ddf27e592e9.png", "homeTeamId": "sr:competitor:2697", "howToPlay": null, "markets": [ { "betAssistWidget": "3Way", "description": "1x2", "expand": 1, "group": "Main", "guidance": "\n
\n\t\n\t
1x2(3 WAY)
\n\t
\n\t\t\n\t\t

This market has 3 possible outcomes at *Full Time.

\n\t\t

The following options are available:

\n\t\t\n\t\t
    \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Home WIN (1) bet wins if Home team wins the match. (e.g. the result of the match is 1:0 , 2:0, 2:1, etc.)\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Draw (X) bet wins if the match without winners. (e.g. the result of the match is 0:0 , 1:1, 2:2, etc.)\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Away WIN (2) bet wins if Away team wins the match. (e.g. the result of the match is 0:1 , 0:2, 1:2, etc.)\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t
\n\t\t\n\t\t

* Bets on this market are settled on the result of the match at the end of its full time including all injury and stoppage time.

\n\t
\n
", "id": 1, "isFavourite": 0, "isShown": 1, "marketLabels": null, "name": "1x2", "outcomes": [ { "description": "Home", "id": "1", "isActive": 1, "odds": "1.76", "probability": "0.5566" }, { "description": "Draw", "id": "2", "isActive": 1, "odds": "3.69", "probability": "0.2609" }, { "description": "Away", "id": "3", "isActive": 1, "odds": "5.26", "probability": "0.1825" } ], "presentationType": 5, "priority": 1, "product": 3, "relatedMarketId": null, "relatedSpecifiers": null, "specifiers": "", "status": 0, "title": "1,X,2", "userFavourite": 0 }, { "betAssistWidget": "3Way", "description": "1x2 - Early Payout", "expand": 1, "group": "Main", "guidance": "\n
\n\t\n\t
1x2 - Early Payout
\n\t
\n\t\t\n\t\t

This market has 3 possible outcomes at *Full Time.

\n\t\t

The following options are available:

\n\t\t\n\t\t
    \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Home WIN (1) bet wins if Home team wins the match or goes 2 goals ahead at any time during the match.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Draw (X) bet wins if the match without winners. (e.g. the result of the match is 0:0 , 1:1, 2:2, etc.)\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Away WIN (2) bet wins if Away team wins the match or goes 2 goals ahead at any time during the match.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t
\n\t\t\n\t\t

* Bets on this market are settled on the result of the match at the end of its full time including all injury and stoppage time.

\n\t
\n
", "id": 5000001, "isFavourite": 0, "isShown": 1, "marketLabels": [ { "iconDesc": "If the team you picked to win is two goals ahead at any time during the game, your bet gets settled as won, even if the opposing team eventually manages to equalize or even win the match!", "iconUrl": "https://static.msport.com/public/up/224d9f98-d811-41ac-a054-64548d15bc98.png", "moreUrl": "https://www.msport.com/ng/promotion/msport_1x2_early_payout.html" } ], "name": "1x2 - Early Payout", "outcomes": [ { "description": "Home", "id": "500000101", "isActive": 1, "odds": "1.74", "probability": "0.5566" }, { "description": "Draw", "id": "500000102", "isActive": 1, "odds": "3.50", "probability": "0.2609" }, { "description": "Away", "id": "500000103", "isActive": 1, "odds": "4.80", "probability": "0.1825" } ], "presentationType": 5, "priority": 1, "product": 3, "relatedMarketId": null, "relatedSpecifiers": null, "specifiers": "", "status": 0, "title": null, "userFavourite": 0 }, { "betAssistWidget": "totalOverUnder", "description": "Over/Under", "expand": 1, "group": "Main", "guidance": "\n
\n\t\n\t
O/U
\n\t
\n\t\t\n\t\t

Predict if the total number of goals scored during the entire match is over/under a given line/spread indicated.*Full Time

\n\t\t

0.5, 1.5, 2.5, 3.5, 4.5, 5.5

\n\t\t

This market has 2 possible outcomes at *Full Time (FT) i.e. Over x.5 or Under x.5. For example (Ov/Un 2.5)

\n\t\t\n\t\t

\n\t\t

Euro 1:0-Home team is getting advantage of 1 goal

    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Draw bet wins if Away team wins with exactly 1 goal. (e.g. the result of this match is 0:1, 1:2, 4:5, etc.)\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t

    • \n\t\t
\n\t\t

Euro 0:2-Away team is getting advantage of 2 goals

\n\t\t\n\t\t
    \n\t\t\t

    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Draw bet wins if Home team wins with exactly 2 goals.(e.g. the result of this match is 2:0, 3:1, 4:2, etc.)\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Away bet wins if Away teams wins the game, or loses with at most 1 goal.(e.g. the result of the match is 0:1, 2:1, 1:0, 2:2, etc.)\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t
\n\t\t\n\t\t

* Bets on this market are settled on the result of the match at the end of its full time including all injury and stoppage time.

\n\t

null, "specifiers": "", "status": 0, "title": "", "userFavourite": 0 }, { "betAssistWidget": null, "description": "HT/FT Result", "expand": 1, "group": "Main", "guidance": "\n
\n\t\n\t
HT/FT Result
\n\t
\n\t\t\n\t\t

Predict the result of a match both at the 1st half time and full time.

\n\t\t

The following options are available:

\n\t\t\n\t\t
    \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t 1/1 bet wins if Home team leads after the 1st half and also wins the match.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t 1/X bet wins if Home team leads after the 1st half and match ends in draw.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t 1/2 bet wins if Home team leads after the 1st half and the Away team wins the match.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t X/1 bet wins if the 1st half ends in draw and the Home team wins the match.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t X/X bet wins if the 1st half ends in draw and also the match ends in draw.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t X/2 bet wins if the 1st half ends in draw and Away team wins the match.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t 2/1 bet wins if Away team leads after the 1st half and Home team wins the match.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t 2/X bet wins if Away team leads after the 1st half and match ends in draw.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t 2/2 bet wins if Away team leads after the 1st half and also wins the match.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t
\n\t\t\n\t\t

* Bets on this market are settled on the result of the match at the end of its full time including all injury and stoppage time.

\n\t
\n

\n\t\n\t
Overtime & goal
\n\t
\n\t\t\n\t\t

Predict if there is overtime in the match and if there is a goal in overtime.*Overtime

\n\t\t

The following options are available:

\n\t\t\n\t\t
    \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Yes bet wins if there is overtime in the match and there is at least one goal in overtime.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t No bet wins if there is no overtime in the match or there is no goal in overtime.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t
\n\t\t\n\t\t

* Bets on this market are settled on the result of the match at the end of its Overtime including all injury and stoppage time.

\n\t
\n

\n\t\n\t

\n\t\n\t
Home Exact goals
\n\t
\n\t\t\n\t\t

Predict the exact number of goals given by the Home team during the match.*Full Time

\n\t\t

The following options are available:

\n\t\t\n\t\t
    \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t 0 bet wins when there is no goal scored by Home team in the match.(e.g. the result of match is 0:0,0:1,etc.)\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t 1 bet wins if there is exactly 1 goal scored by Home team in the match.(e.g. the result of match is 1:0,1:1,etc.)\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t 2 bet wins if there are exactly 2 goals scored by Home team in the match.(e.g. the result of match is 2:0, 2:1,2:2, etc.)\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t 3 bet wins if there are exactly 3 goals scored by Home team in the match.(e.g. the result of match is 3:0, 3:1, 3:2, etc.)\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t 4+ bet wins if there are 4 or more goals scored by Home team in the match.(e.g. the result of match is 4:0, 4:1, 5:0,5:1, etc.)\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t
\n\t\t\n\t\t

* Bets on this market are settled on the result of the match at the end of its full time including all injury and stoppage time.

\n\t
\n

\n\t\n\t
Goal range
\n\t
\n\t\t\n\t\t

Predict the range of total number of goals at*Full Time.

\n\t\t

The following options are available:

\n\t\t\n\t\t
    \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t 0-1 bet wins if the number of total goals at full time is 0 or 1.(e.g. the result of the match is 0:0, 1:0 or 0:1)\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t 2-3 bet wins if the number of total goals at full time is 2 or 3.(e.g. the result of the match is 0:2, 1:1, 1:2, etc.)\n\t\t\t

\n\t\n\t
HT FT Correct score
\n\t
\n\t\t\n\t\t

\n\t\t

\n\t\t\n\t\t

    • \n\t\t

    ......

    \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t 1:1 2:1 bet wins if the first half result is 1:1 and the full time result is 2:1.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t

    ......

    \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t 1:2 4+ bet wins if the first half result is 1:2 and the number of total goals at full time is 4 or more.(e.g. 1:2 1:3, 1:2 2:3, etc.)\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t

    ......

    \t\n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t 4+ 4+ bet wins if the number of goals in the first half is 4 or more and the number of total goals at full time is 4 or more.(e.g. 2:2 2:3, 3:1 3:2, etc.)\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t
\n\t\t\n\t\t

* Bets on this market are settled on the result of the match at the end of its full time including all injury and stoppage time.

\n\t

\n\t\n\t
Highest scoring half
\n\t
\n\t\t\n\t\t

Predict which half will be the higher scoring half.*Half Time.

\n\t\t

The following options are available:

\n\t\t\n\t\t
    \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t 1st bet wins if the two teams scored more in the first half than in the second.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t 2nd bet wins if the two teams scored less in the first half than in the second.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Equal bet wins if the two teams scored as many points in the first half as in the second.\n\t\t\t

    • \n\t\t\t

    • \n\t\t
\n\t\t\n\t\t

* Bets on this market are settled on the result of the match at the end of its first half time including all injury and stoppage time.

\n\t
\n

\n\t\n\t
1st half - 1x2 & GG/NG
\n\t
\n\t\t\n\t\t

\n\t\t

The following options are available:

\n\t\t\n\t\t
    \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Home wins & GG bet wins if the Home leads in the first half and both teams score in the first half.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Home wins & NG bet wins if the Home leads in the first half and Away team does not score in the first half.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Away wins & GG bet wins if the Away leads in the first half and both teams score in the first half.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Away wins & NG bet wins if the Away leads in the first half and Home team does not score in the first half.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Draw & GG bet wins if the teams draw in the first half and both teams to score in the first half.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Draw & NG bet wins if the teams draw in the first half and at least one team does not score in the first half.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t
\n\t\t\n\t\t

* Bets on this market are settled on the result of the match at the end of its first half time including all injury and stoppage time.

\n\t\n\t
1st half - 1x2 & O/U
\n\t
\n\t\t\n\t\t

\n\t\t

The following options are available(for example O/U 2.5):

\n\t\t\n\t\t
    \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Home & Over 2.5 bet wins if Home leads in the first half and the total goals in the first half is 3 or more.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Draw & Over 2.5 bet wins if the teams draw in the first half and the total goals in the first half is 3 or more.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t

    • \n\t\t\t

\n\t\t\n\t\t

\n\t\n\t
2nd half- double chance
\n\t
\n\t\t\n\t\t

A Double Chance bet allows you to cover two of the three possible outcomes in the match with one bet. This market is settled in the *Second half.

\n\t\t

The following options are available:

\n\t\t\n\t\t
    \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t 1/X if the second half result is either home win or draw then bets on this option are winners.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t X/2 if the second half result is either draw or away win then bets on this option are winners.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t 1/2 if the second half result is either home win or away win then bets on this option are winners.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t
\n\t\t\n\t\t

* Bets on this market are settled on the result of the match at the end of its second half time including all injury and stoppage time.

\n\t
\n

\n\t\n\t
2nd half - handicap
\n\t
\n\t\t\n\t\t

Predict the second half score of the match taking in consideration the handicap in brackets. For example (0:1) indicates that the Away team has one goal advantage, as for (1:0) indicates that the Home team has one goal advantage.*Second half

\n\t\t

The following options are available(for example handicap(1:0)):

\n\t\t\n\t\t
    \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Home(1:0) bet wins if Home team leads by any number of goals in the second half, or the teams draw in the second half.(e.g. the score of the second half is 0:0, 1:0, 2:1, etc.)\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Draw(1:0) bet wins if Away team leads by exactly 1 goal in the second half.(e.g. the score of the second half is 0:1, 1:2, 2:3, etc.)\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Away(1:0) bet wins if Away team leads by at least 2 goals in the second half.(e.g. the score of the second half is 0:2, 1:3, 1:4, etc.)\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t
\n\t\t\n\t\t

* Bets on this market are settled on the result of the match at the end of its second half time including all injury and stoppage time.

\n\t
\n

  • \n\t\t\t\t Draw/Away & Yes bet wins if draw or Away wins at full time and both teams score at full time.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Draw/Away & No bet wins if draw or Away wins at full time and at least one team does not score at full time.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t
\n\t\t\n\t\t

* Bets on this market are settled on the result of the match at the end of its full time including all injury and stoppage time.

\n\t\n\t
1x2 & GG/NG
\n\t
\n\t\t\n\t\t

Combo: match result at full time & whether both teams score.*Full Time

\n\t\t

The following options are available:

\n\t\t\n\t\t
    \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Home wins & GG bet wins if the Home team wins the match and both teams score.(e.g. the result of the match is 2:1, 3:1,3:2,etc.)\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Home wins & NG bet wins if the Home team wins the match and Away team does not score.(e.g. the result of the match is 1:0,2:0,3:0,etc.)\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Away wins & GG bet wins if the Away team wins the match and both teams score.(e.g. the result of the match is 1:2,2:3,1:3,etc.)\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Away wins & NG bet wins if the Away team wins the match and Home team does not score.(e.g. the result of the match is 0:1,0:2,0:3,etc.)\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Draw & GG bet wins if the teams draw and both teams score.(e.g. the result of the match is 1:1,2:2,3:3,etc.)\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Draw & NG bet wins if the teams draw and neither team scores.(e.g. the result of the match is 0:0)\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t
\n\t\t\n\t\t

* Bets on this market are settled on the result of the match at the end of its full time including all injury and stoppage time.

\n\t
\n

\n\t\n\t
Halftime/fulltime & total
\n\t
\n\t\t\n\t\t

Combo: halftime/full time 1X2 and total at *full time.

\n\t\t

The following options are available(For example Ov/Un 1.5):

\n\t\t\n\t\t
    \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Home/Home & Under 1.5 bet wins if Home wins the 1st half and Home wins at full time and the total number of goals is under 1.5.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Home/Draw & Under 1.5 bet wins if Home wins the 1st half and the teams draw at full time and the total number of goals is under 1.5.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Home/Away & Under 1.5 bet wins if Home wins the 1st half and Away wins at full time and the total number of goals is under 1.5.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Draw/Home & Under 1.5 bet wins if the teams draw the 1st half and Home wins at full time and the total number of goals is under 1.5.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Draw/Draw & Under 1.5 bet wins if the teams draw the 1st half and draw at full time and the total number of goals is under 1.5.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Draw/Away & Under 1.5 bet wins if the teams draw the 1st half and Away wins at full time and the total number of goals is under 1.5.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Away/Home & Under 1.5 bet wins if Away wins the 1st half and Home wins at full time and the total number of goals is under 1.5.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Away/Draw & Under 1.5 bet wins if Away wins the 1st half and the teams draw at full time and the total number of goals is under 1.5.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Away/Away & Under 1.5 bet wins if Away wins the 1st half and Away wins at full time and the total number of goals is under 1.5.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Home/Home & Over 1.5 bet wins if Home wins the 1st half and Home wins at full time and the total number of goals is over 1.5.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t

    • \n\t\t\t

    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Draw/Draw & Over 1.5 bet wins if the teams draw the 1st half and the teams draw at full time and the total number of goals is over 1.5.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Draw/Away & Over 1.5 bet wins if the teams draw the 1st half and Away wins at full time and the total number of goals is over 1.5.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Away/Home & Over 1.5 bet wins if Away wins the 1st half and Home wins at full time and the total number of goals is over 1.5.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Away/Draw & Over 1.5 bet wins if Away wins the 1st half and the teams draw at full time the the total number of goals is over 1.5.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t\t

    • \n\t\t
\n\t\t\n\t\t

* Bets on this market are settled on the result of the match at the end of its full time including all injury and stoppage time.

\n\t\t\n\t\t

Predict that the selected player will score the Nth goal of the match and the correct socre. *full time

\n\t\t

The following options are available:

\n\t\t\n\t\t
    \n\t\t\t

  • \n\t\t\t\t Player & 2:0 bet wins if the selected player scores the Nth goal and the result of the macth is 2:0.\n\t\t\t

    ......

    • \n\t\t\t
  • \n\t\t\t\t Other bet wins if there is any other results.\n\t\t\t
    • \n\t\t
\n\t\t\n\t\t

* Bets on this market are settled on the result of the match at the end of its full time including all injury and stoppage time.

\n\t
